title: The Death of Allegory road as symbol

content.question: In the closing stanza, “the road” (line 30) functions as a symbol of the

choices.label: attraction the speaker feels for a Renaissance-era life of adventure
intensity of the speaker’s desire for the return of allegorical poems
remoteness of Renaissance customs from the habits of modern people
finality with which allegorical figures have vanished from modern culture

content.answer: finality with which allegorical figures have vanished from modern culture

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Identify and explain the function of a symbol.
